title: Win rate %
body: How much win rate % should you have on your main champion?

replies.body:
Isn't it mainly reliant on your 4 team mates?
As I see players do really well, but low win rates because of the team......is there another way to refer to your efficiency with a champion?
Kinda depends how often you get to play your main champ and how much worse you do when you have to play something else. i'd say 60-70%  would be decent though.
Ops that was bad wording, i meant how much is a good percentage to have on your main champ xD

As long as your main champion is above 50% it shouldn't really matter, you know when your doing well and not doing well on the champion.

60-70%+ is generally considered good though.

50% is enough to advance trough divisions.
Most pros get 80% on their mains, _when climbing on smurfs_. They still set around 50% once they reach their level.
Ummm  depends on champ and rank i guess
Unless you mean higher tiers then id say 65% +
